contest-event.event-date:
July 12, 1902 D Mumbles Contest (Section C)
Mumbles Contest (Section C) 0 Test Piece Contest
mumbles-contest-section-c
None
A Garland of Song
Mumbles Pier, Glamorgan Caerphilly originally drawn 1 but were not there in time and were disqualified. Best flugel - Cardiff St Saviours. Best baritone - Merthyr Vale. Best G trombone - Great Western Colliery. 8 bands competed. 12th annual South Wales and Monmouth Contest.
July 5, 2018, 10:51 p.m. May 3, 2020, 10:21 a.m.
1 Great Western Colliery Silver J. H. Roberts
2 Merthyr Vale Town Henry Bentley
3 Pontycymer William Layman
4 Penrhiw R. C. Smith
Unknown Result Ogmore Valley Silver Band George Evans
Unknown Result Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Thomas Eastwood
Unknown Result St. Saviour's (Cardiff) Silver Carl Taylor
Unknown Result Tylorstown W. G. Morgan
Disqualified Caerphilly Unknown
